title: HAP 08 - Solomon, Socrates, and Other Sages - Early Ethiopian Philosophy
itunes:title: HAP 08 - Solomon, Socrates, and Other Sages - Early Ethiopian Philosophy
description: Philosophy in Ethiopia, with translations of religious and philosophical texts into Ge’ez and a national epic called the Kebra Nagast.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
